billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Authorizes and directs the committee on open government to study proactive disclosure as a means of increasing transparency and access to government information
summary: Authorizes and directs the committee on open government to study proactive disclosure as a means of increasing transparency and access to government information.
actClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing and directing the committee on open government to study proactive disclosure as a means of increasing transparency and access to government information
